text: the world of Music in general is
changing very rapidly as it is in

to your advantage by that I mean do you
Embrace technology musicians now depend
less and less on someone else a major

are starting to self-produce CDs they
are on the internet they're on YouTube
they are doing many things that are
really brand new and in many ways
especially in classical
music that said it is to your advantage
to have a career that is
multi-dimensional to just play in a
symphony orchestra or to just be a

play in a string quartet is a fine thing
to do certainly but instead of using the
the job in a symphony orchestra as an
end use it as a platform to do many
other
things a very interesting example of a

what we see with yoyo Ma and what he is
doing with the Silk Road
Project you can certainly make the
argument that yoyo doesn't need to do
these types of things but the fact that
as an artist he feels compelled to
explore music from Asia and music from a

localized and not necessarily had

tremendous advocate for this type of

a lot of musicians are going in this in

that's a a fabulous way to have a very
